directions: Appearing In: The American Country Inn and Bed & Breakfast Cookbook, Volume One. From: Heavenly View Bed and Breakfast, Anchorage, Alaska In a medium mixing bowl, blend together 1-1/2 cups flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, oil, milk, egg and 1 cup blueberries. Beat thoroughly for 30 seconds and spread in a greased round 9x1-1/2-inch pan or an 8x8x2-inch pan. Combine 1/3 cup flour, brown sugar, connamon and butter. Sprinkle over batter and top with the remaining berries. Bake in a 375 degree oven for 25 to 30 minutes, until done. Dont overbake. Serve warm with butter or honey. Serves 8. Sonyas note: If I remember correctly, this takes a bit longer to bake than what is in the instructions, but it is worth the wait!
title: Alaskan Blueberry Coffee Cake
